name: Bad Summer
storyline:
Bad Summer – A Mystery Unfolds

An ordinary summer job turns into a waking nightmare when camp counselor Jenny stumbles upon a chilling mystery at Camp Bear Ridge. Meanwhile, Detective Oliver Smith races against time to piece together the truth.

Strange phone calls.
Eerie disappearances.
️ Something is watching from the trees.

Camp Bear Ridge isn’t what it seems… Will you uncover the truth before it’s too late?

Wishlist Bad Summer on Steam & join the mystery!
summary: Bad Summer is a visual novel developed by S&J Games. An ordinary job takes a dark turn when camp counselor Jenny stumbles into a chilling mystery, while Detective Oliver Smith races against time to uncover the truth. Strange phone calls, eerie disappearances, and something watching from the trees. Camp Bear Ridge isn't what it seems.
